text: Abdullah Al-Fahma is a member of the Kuwaiti National Assembly, representing the fifth district. Born in 1958, Al-Fahma was elected to the National Assembly in 2003. He is considered an Independent and is on good terms with the royal family. He is a member of the Al-Awazem tribe.Arab Times MP Profile ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the National Assembly of Kuwait Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Abdullah Al-Fahma
